nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'MacroMoleculesGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_MacroMoleculesTracers_sea_ice_coupling
nml_option.description: if true, couple MacroMolecules fields with sea ice

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include MacroMoleculesGRP.

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the MacroMolecules tracer group.

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the MacroMolecules tracer group.

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the MacroMolecules tracer group.

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the MacroMolecules tracer group.

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the MacroMolecules tracer group.

package.name: MacroMoleculesTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the MacroMolecules tracer group.

var.name: PROTTend
var.description: Proteins Tendency

var.name: POLYTend
var.description: Polysaccharides Tendency

var.name: LIPTend
var.description: Lipids Tendency

var.name: PROTSurfaceFlux
var.description: Proteins Surface Flux

var.name: POLYSurfaceFlux
var.description: Polysaccharides Surface Flux

var.name: LIPSurfaceFlux
var.description: Lipids Surface Flux

var.name: avgOceanSurfaceDOC
var.description: Ocean Surface Organics concentration: (1,2)=>(polysaccharides,lipids)

var.name: avgOceanSurfaceDON
var.description: Ocean Surface Organic Proteins concentration

var.name: PROTPistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which PROT is restored to PROTSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: POLYPistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which POLY is restored to POLYSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: LIPPistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which LIP is restored to LIPSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: PROTSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by PROTPistonVelocity.

var.name: POLYSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by POLYPistonVelocity.

var.name: LIPSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Salinity is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by LIPPistonVelocity.

var.name: PROTInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which PROT is restored to PROTInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: POLYInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which POLY is restored to POLYInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: LIPInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which LIP is restored to LIPInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: PROTInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by PROTInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: POLYInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by POLYInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: LIPInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Salinity is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by LIPInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: PROTExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of PROT

var.name: POLYExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of POLY

var.name: LIPExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of LIP

var.name: PROTIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, PROT is reset to PROT * PROTIdealAgeMask, valid values of PROTIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: POLYIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, POLY is reset to POLY * POLYIdealAgeMask, valid values of POLYIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: LIPIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, LIP is reset to LIP * LIPIdealAgeMask, valid values of LIPIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: PROTTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, PROT is reset to TTDMask, valid values of PROTTTDMask or 0 and 1

var.name: POLYTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, POLY is reset to TTDMask, valid values of POLYTTDMask or 0 and 1

var.name: LIPTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, LIP is reset to LIPTTDMask, valid values of LIPTTDMask or 0 and 1
